author: Besmir Zanaj
comment: The app lets you know where you are but no more. You can't even normally exit from the app with the back key.
title: It is ok

author: Slava Savkin
comment: Worked fine for me, good job!

author: Tobiah Ng
comment: A lot of inaccurate information on bus schedule, destination and route. Eg. Viva purple doesn't go to stop 5049!?!! And it would be better if we don't have to type anything but just the Route number for the ROUTE SEARCH that would be better!!

reply.author: Kinetiqa Labs
reply.content: We apologize for the problems you've encountered. Hopefully the recent updates have fixed the problems you've encountered.

title: Inaccurate information

author: Alex K
comment: Shows the wrong stop for stop ids that I use

reply.author: Kinetiqa Labs
reply.content:
Hi Alex,

We are constantly looking for ways to improve our app! Can you please send us the stop/stop ID pair that you're having problems with at nexttransit@outlook.com?

title: Wrong stop for stop id's

reply.author: Kinetiqa Labs
reply.content:
Hi Abdul,

We strive to make our app consistent across all devices - what kind of screen are you seeing? If you're having problems, don't hesitate to contact us at nexttransit@outlook.com

comment: I tried to plan a trip and i got a blank page. It doesn't work on my tablet. Seems it's using like the website trip planner anyway
title: Not working
